column1: ('Consolidated Statements of Cash Flows - USD ($) $ in Millions', 'Consolidated Statements of Cash Flows - USD ($) $ in Millions')
CASH PROVIDED BY (USED IN) OPERATING ACTIVITIES
Adjustments to reconcile net earnings to operating cash flows:
Asset impairment and exit costs, net of cash paid
Cash effects of changes, net of the effects from acquired companies:
Accrued liabilities and other current assets
Net cash provided by operating activities
CASH PROVIDED BY (USED IN) INVESTING ACTIVITIES
Purchase of businesses, net of acquired cash
Net cash used in investing activities
Short-term borrowing activity by original maturity:
Net repayments - maturities of 90 days or less
Sale (purchase) of subsidiary shares to/(from) noncontrolling interests
Net cash used in financing activities
Effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalents
